logline: An austere global coordination summit teeters on the brink of collapse amidst looming catastrophic AI threats.
scene: Captured in a dimly lit control room, a long, scarred table dominates the space, littered with high-tech communication devices. Tension is palpable as representatives from the world's major powers are captured mid-discussion, with some leaning forward in intense debate while others sit back, arms crossed, visibly skeptical. A massive screen flickers with ominous graphs and AI-generated predictions of disaster scenarios, casting an eerie glow on their faces. The room is surrounded by reinforced glass windows overlooking a shattered skyline, symbolic of the world at stake. Outside, a chaotic scene of drones and unregulated AI tech adds a sense of urgency and danger to the dialogue inside.
camera: Wide-angle lens capturing the entire room, focusing on the conflicting expressions of the representatives.
lighting: Low, moody light with flickering highlights from the screens creating tension among the characters.
productionDesign: Industrial, utilitarian style with a worn-out feel, suggesting a once-modern facility now on the brink of existential crisis, filled with advanced yet chaotic tech.
signatureTwist: The external chaos contrasts sharply with the internal debate, hinting at the impending collapse of governance as tensions rise.
